entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Sioux Narrows

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
